sentences.english: Tulip grows large brightly-colored cup-shaped flower in spring.
sentences.chinese: 天開出顏色鮮亮的杯狀的花朵。

sentences.english: She freshened up the room with some flowers.
sentences.chinese: 她用一些花使房間鮮亮起來。

sentences.english: First we decorate the walls with cut papers all red and bright.
sentences.chinese: 我們先要把牆上貼上鮮亮的紅窗花。

sentences.english: Pearlescent coating is scorch and stain resistant.
sentences.chinese: 鮮亮的覆蓋材料可防沾污的燒焦。

sentences.english: If you’re free and clear of the frost date (ours is coming soon yay!) then plant some brightly colored flowers in prominent areas through out your yard.
sentences.chinese: 那就在小院各處的顯著位置上種植些鮮亮色彩的花卉。

sentences.english: Painted above the doorway in brightly coloured, flowing letters were the words
sentences.chinese: 屋門上幾行漆字，顏色鮮亮，字體流暢。

sentences.english: The bright colours of children's posters are still visible on adjacent walls.
sentences.chinese: 牆上還可以看到孩子們做的海報鮮亮的顏色。

sentences.english: In the Renaissance period the nobility wore elaborate and brightly colored dresses.
sentences.chinese: 在文藝復興時期，貴族們都熱衷於精美鮮亮的裙裝。

sentences.english: The flowers were extremely blue and extremely vivid. They could be seen from a great distance.
sentences.chinese: 那些花的顏色極藍，極鮮亮，很遠就能看得見。

sentences.english: The use of beets in this soup lend the dish a vibrant red color.
sentences.chinese: 甜菜讓這種湯呈現出一種鮮亮的紅色。

sentences.english: It's very sparkly, sparkly street, I would say, and very clean as well.
sentences.chinese: 這條街非常光鮮亮麗，我想說，也很乾淨。

sentences.english: These chestnuts are of bright reddish-brown.
This will make your lips more brightly, and teeth - whiter.
sentences.chinese: 這會使你的嘴脣更加鮮亮，牙齒更白。

sentences.english: They are using a scantly clad woman who is very attractive with bright colors standing next to a bottle of whiskey.
sentences.chinese: 他們讓一個穿着鮮亮的性感女性坐在一瓶威士忌邊上。

sentences.english: This wine shows anice deep ruby red colour.
sentences.chinese: 這款酒浮現着鮮亮的深寶石紅色。

sentences.english: This YE VINTNER wine shows a nice deep ruby red colour.
sentences.chinese: 這款優福特紅酒呈現着鮮亮的深寶石紅色。

definition: Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
